Title: Includes reckless operation of a motor vehicle resulting in the death or serious injury of a companion animal in the definition aggravated animal cruelty
Summary: Includes reckless operation of a motor vehicle resulting in the death or serious injury of a companion animal in the definition of aggravated animal cruelty.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to including reckless operation of a motor vehicle resulting in the death or serious injury of a companion animal as aggravated animal cruelty
